venue.address_2: Parking area is at the Hancock Overlook just past the hairpin turn.
venue.name: Hancock Notch Trailhead

item.description:
Join me as I continue my quest for a single season winter 48. This will be a relatively faced-paced hike and the trails are very steep in places. We will be going up the north peak first and then taking the ridge to the south peak. This means we will ascend the slide.

Standard winter gear is required, and don't forget the headlamps. It is also a good idea to bring an ice axe given how steep the slide is.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be driving a silver mazda wagon.
item.name: Hancocks
